name: Liminal Drake
description: The Liminal Drake is a large dragon known for its manipulation of space, flying with great flexibility. It has a distinctive sleek appearance with cosmic features.
memorable: It can incapacitate foes with its Nauseating Luminance and move through solid objects.
goals: To disrupt and incapacitate foes, maintaining cosmic dominance.
relations: Other dragons, cosmic entities, or fiends may be related or allied.
environment: Cosmic voids, asteroids, or high-altitude locations.
strengths: Immunity to cold damage, resistances to multiple elemental damage types, and condition immunities make it exceptionally tough in combat.
weaknesses: Relatively low Strength score limits its physical melee capabilities.
attacks: Multiattack with one bite dealing piercing and cold damage, and two claws inflicting slashing and cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: Stellar Breath, exhaling fire and radiant damage in a wide cone.
senses: The Liminal Drake has darkvision up to 120 feet.
additional_information: Can use Incorporeal Movement to pass through creatures and objects.
Incapacitates creatures with its Nauseating Luminance ability.
Possesses Void Dweller ability allowing for quick cosmic travel.
Can teleport with Warp Space ability.
High Dexterity grants it excellent evasion.
